propertise.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELCT ROWNUM "RNUM", A.* FROM ( SELECT CONSULT_NO , CONSULT_TITLE , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "ENROLL_DATE" , CONSULT_CATEGORY , ANSWER_STATUS FROM CONSULT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE C.USER_NO = ? , C.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COUNSULT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
